Text:
CAN ANYONE TELL ME HOW TO SYNCHRONIZE THE SUB TITLES WITH THE MOVIE? THEY ARE IN A SEPERATE FOLDER.

THANK yOU.

O.K. For anyone else experiencing the same problem. The answer is to put the selected language sub-titles into the same folder as the movie. (easy really, like everything else if yoy know what you are doing.)

you just need search it at youtube :
How to fix subtitles that don't synchronize with your movie
